title: Could Jordan Peterson do for Women what he did for Men with Proverb's Lady Wisdom?
description:
Peterson announced he's going to continue the Biblical series on Proverbs. Proverbs on one level is a list of advice given to young men. On another it's a journey led by Lady Wisdom into the nuances of life. What will Jordan Peterson do with it? What are the possibilities especially for broadening his audience beyond men? 

Conversation notes

Lauren Southern

White Noise

Coleridge and Wordsworth turn to the French Revolution

Myth is about a moral way of seeing the world, decisions and consequences through story

As those stories get inside of them, it will help them to orient their life in a certain way

Underneath it was a structure, in a post-structural world. 

Myth is a way of saying there is an order. If you use your freedom to violate it. 

Proverbs is a continuation fo that sense. 

Gnosis: those who feel they must know… 
Agnosis: skepticism, 

Wisdom is that middle way: 

Natural unfolding in that sense. Myths to proverbs, explicit book attempting to address his son. 

Dr Zhivago and Proverbs

Feminine , Lady Wisdom

60th anniversary since Pasternak died. 

Pasternak: St. George and the Dragon

Pasternak Peterson and Proverbs and Pastoring

Ron Dart on Pasternak
